name: Zollpo
description: All The Sales Around You In One Click!
overview:
What is Zollpo.com?

Wouldn’t you want to know if there are any exciting new sales around you? Zollpo.com gives you the power to find all these sales and more in a click away. Zollpo.com was created in order to give customers a free access to the “real world’s” sales. Sales that unless the web, might not have been visible.

Zollpo.com also connects Small & Medium Business with less marketing tools to their customers. In Zollpo.com we’ve developed a search engine to help people find on a static map, all the sales: around them, around their work place, around their next vacation spot. All in the click of a button!
